text: Delhivery is an Indian logistics and supply chain company, based in Gurgaon. It was founded in 2011 by Sahil Barua, Mohit Tandon, Bhavesh Manglani, Suraj Saharan, and Kapil Bharati. The company has over 85 fulfillment centres, 29 automated sort centres, 160 hubs, 7,500+ partner centres, and 3,500+ direct delivery centres, as of 2021. The company mainly provides delivery services to e-commerce businesses, which accounts for about two-thirds of its revenue. == Awards == * ET Startup of the Year Award 2019 *Mahindra Transport Excellence Award 2018 *Young Turk Start-up of the Year 2016 == References == Category:2011 establishments
title: Delhivery
